column1: Smoque BBQ////If it was up to me Barbecue would be a part of the food pyramid or food groups. Because while it isn't vital for your body to have
column2: it brings a great deal of joy. Because nothing is tastier than smoked meat falling apart due to the breaking down of connective tissue. I dare you to think of something
column3: and guess what you can't. That's why America won the Cold War.
